price: O you who believe, when you encounter a group [in battle], stand firm and remember Allah much, so that you may triumph[27].
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا لَقِيتُمۡ فِئَةٗ فَٱثۡبُتُواْ وَٱذۡكُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ
footnotes: [27] How to win a victory: 1. To stand firm. 2. To mention Allah profusely and seek His help.
